item.title: Chronic Back Pain in Seniors May Ease With Acupuncture
item.description: New research offers evidence for considering acupuncture as part of comprehensive, low-risk pain management for older adults. Medscape Medical News

item.title: FDA Approves Lurbinectedin Combo for ES-SCLC Maintenance
item.description: The approval is for a first-line combination maintenance therapy for extensive-stage SCLC. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Endocarditis Deaths Rise in Pregnancy-Related Infections
item.description: Sepsis was the leading cause of infection-related maternal mortality. Medscape Medical News
